A technique designed to be used to absorb a [[tailed beast]]'s [[chakra]]. The user produces the {{translation|"sit"|座|suwaru}} kanji on their palm and creates a series of wooden pillars, which are engraved with what resemble [[Wikipedia:Chinese guardian lions|foo dog]] faces and have lit wicks on top of them.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 317, page 6</ref> When the user slams their palm on the ground, the wooden statues rush towards the target and [[Chakra Absorption Techniques|absorb]] its chakra.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 322, pages 10-11</ref>
